description:
Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponent`s lone weakness before it`s too late?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`Ordalie des marais. Chopper, le pirate, contre Gédatsu le prélat
Numa no Shiren! Chopper VS Shinkan Gedatsu!!
The Ordeal of the Swamp! Chopper vs. Sky Punk Gedatsu!
¡El Juicio del Pantano! Chopper contra el sacerdote Gedatsu
Испытание болотом! Чоппер против жреца Гедацу!
محنة المستنقع! تشوبّر ضدّ زعيم السّماء غيداتسو!!
บททดสอบบึง! ช็อปเปอร์ปะทะเกดาซ!!
沼の試練! チョッパーVS神官ゲダツ!!
